metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10064 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: hostapd before 2.6, in EAP mode, makes calls to the rand() and random() standard library functions without any preceding srand() or srandom() call, which results in inappropriate use of deterministic values. This was fixed in conjunction with CVE-2016-10743.

criterions.comment: wpa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
wpa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
